Why MyCamper?

Biggest selection
On MyCamper you find the biggest selection in Switzerland with more than 1400 vehicles
Sustainable
Local camper sharing is sustainable and saves the environment
Fully protected
Travel worry free with our integrated insurance package
Personal
In case of questions we're here to help

How does it work?

1. Search campers
Look for a campervan fulfilling your needs
2. Send booking request
Send a non-binding request or book via instant booking
3. Details and confirmation
Agree on the details and finalize the booking
4. Get in and get lost
At the vehicle handover the owner explains the vehicle and then you're good to go.

Safe and sound thanks to the Baloise and MyCamper insurance package

All vehicles on MyCamper can be covered by our insurance solution of Baloise. The insurance includes liability recourse, hull, bonus protection and the interior.
